name: UpdateInvoiceDetails
description:
Update invoice details in HubSpot CRM.

Use this tool to perform a partial update of an invoice in HubSpot CRM. The invoice can be identified by its internal ID or a unique property. Only existing properties with provided values will be updated, and any read-only or non-existent properties will cause an error.

parameters.name: invoice_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the invoice, either the internal ID or specified unique property value, to update in HubSpot CRM.

parameters.name: invoice_update_properties
parameters.description: JSON object with key-value pairs representing the invoice properties to update. Only existing properties can be updated.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: Name of the unique property for identifying the invoice object.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object
